author: Staff Reporter
text:
Routine work was completely paralysed in several departments as government employees continued their strike for the second day on Thursday, pressing for 20-point charter of demands.

Demonstration

They staged a demonstration near the RDO office in the town raising slogans against the government.

With no response from the government, the government employees’ associations would intensify their agitation tomorrow, said the association district secretary, Mubarak Ali. Similar demonstration was held in Theni also.
title: Government employees’ protest continues
